name: Cataclysm Early Build Demo
description:
An early build of Cataclysm, a 2D platformer designed for a class project. Created by Thomas Field, Taylor Driver, Ryan Thomas and Anthony Duben.

Use the arrow/WASD keys to move, space bar to jump and F to attack.

Sources:

1. Artwork

Backgrounds / Scenery

Splash Page: http://omgspacememes.blogspot.com/2013/11/bacon-cat-in-space.html

Wolf Level (and Tutorial): https://www.gameart2d.com/free-platformer-game-tileset.html

Squirrel Level: https://wallpapercave.com/wp/6m7udmx.jpg

Bird Level: Surt, https://opengameart.org/content/classical-ruin-tiles

Porcupine Level: Surt, https://opengameart.org/content/classical-ruin-tiles

 

Victory Level: https://gabriev82.deviantart.com/art/Sky-Clouds-drawing-practice-187787449

 

Sprites:

         Cat: dogchicken, https://opengameart.org/content/cat-fighter-sprite-sheet

                  Bird: cbritez, https://opengameart.org/content/sj-monsters

                  Wolf: Daniel Schofield, http://dropr.com/8bitbuddy/99638/2d_assets/+?p=1009379

                  Squirrel:

 

http://allacrost.org/wiki/index.php?title=File:Sprite_creature_squirrel.png

                  Porcupine:

http://www.clipartpanda.com/categories/hedgehog-clipart
